message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product for $140. I believe it will be very valuable for you.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate your valuation of the product. I am willing to pay $130 for the product.
Thanks for the offer, Bob. How about we meet in the middle at $135?
I understand your position, Alice. I am comfortable paying up to $132 for the product. Let me know if this works for you.
